segment.source: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages
segment.target: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages

segment.source: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages
segment.target: Create packages for multiple operating systems or languages

segment.source: You'll create multiple versions of your custom browser package if:
segment.target: You'll create multiple versions of your custom browser package if:

segment.source: You support more than 1 version of Windows®.
segment.target: You support more than 1 version of Windows®.

segment.source: You have custom installation packages with only minor differences.
segment.target: You have custom installation packages with only minor differences.

segment.source: Like, having a different phone number.
segment.target: Like, having a different phone number.

segment.source: Create an installation package using the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11, as described in the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard options topic.
segment.target: Create an installation package using the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11, as described in the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard options topic.

segment.source: Go to your CIE/Custom folder and rename the file.
segment.target: Go to your CIE/Custom folder and rename the file.

segment.source: For example, if you need a version for employees in Texas, rename the file to Texas.ins.
segment.target: For example, if you need a version for employees in Texas, rename the file to Texas.ins.

segment.source: Run the wizard again, using the Custom folder as the destination directory.
segment.target: Run the wizard again, using the Custom folder as the destination directory.

segment.source: Except for the Title bar text, Favorites, Links bar, Home page, and Search bar, keep all of your wizard settings the same for all of your build computers.
segment.target: Except for the Title bar text, Favorites, Links bar, Home page, and Search bar, keep all of your wizard settings the same for all of your build computers.
